format: A data frame with 42 observations on the following 2 variables.
description:
Description
Estimation of the degradation profile of an agrochemical based on soil samples at depth 0-10cm
from a calibration experiment.
title: Dose-response profile of degradation of agrochemical using nasturtium
reference:
It is an experiment with seven concentrations and six replicates per concentration. Nasturtium
is sensitive and its weight reduces noticeable at low concentrations.

parameters.weight: a numeric vector of plant weight (mg) after 3 weeks' growth
